author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Summer Issue of MIA Connections E-magazine Showcases Hot Spots and Travel Tips From Arrival To DepartureTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Summer Issue of MIA Connections E-magazine Showcases Hot Spots and Travel Tips From Arrival To Departure
Whether it’s learning about Miami’s most indulgent spas and thriving music scene, or where to buy everything from books to beers from around the world at Miami International Airport, you can read all about it in the summer issue of MIA Connections. The latest issue of the airport’s official digital magazine, available online now, also features local attractions and special events around town, including family-friendly activities.
“Our newest issue of MIA Connections is filled with valuable information, fun facts and alluring photos about the best Miami has to offer,” said Miami-Dade Aviation Director Emilio T. González. “It serves as a comprehensive yet exciting travel guide for people visiting our airport and community.”
Whether traveling through MIA or planning a future trip, readers worldwide can explore the best dining, shopping and entertainment options available inside MIA and throughout Miami-Dade County with the free digital magazine, which is accessible while inside the airport via MIA’s wireless network.
MIA Connections is the first airport digital magazine in the country available in both English and Spanish, with tourist-friendly content from HCP/Aboard Publishing, the custom publishing arm of the Miami Herald.
Source:- Miami International Airport
